content: x7 35 06 2sc increase 2sc x7 42 07 5sc increase x7 49 08 3sc increase 3sc x7 56 09 7sc increase x7 63 10 single_crochet-blo x63 63 11-25 63sc 63 26 single_crochet-blo x7 decrease-blo x7 56 27 3sc decrease 3sc x7 49 28 5sc decrease x7 42 insert the eyes between rnds 18 and 19 at 10 sts apart start stuffing the body here and continue stuffing throughout the following rounds 29 2sc decrease 2sc x7 35 30 3sc decrease x7 28 31 single_crochet decrease single_crochet x7 21 32 single_crochet decrease x7 14 33 decrease x7 7 break the yarn leaving a long thread and close the round through the front loops of the remaining 7 sts to get the body to pinch in at the top and bottom push the thread back through the centre of the bottom of the body and pull it out through the centre of the top go back through the top and out through the bottom and gently pull the thread to the desired look weave in the end arms start with yarn a and work in a continuous spiral of rounds make two 01 5sc in magic_ring 5 02-09 5sc 5 to finish chain and flatten the arm work 2sc across the top of the arm through the corresponding sts on both sides leave a long tail for sewing cut the thread and pull through the arms should be sewn between rounds 18 and 19 and be roughly 10 sts away from the eyes © 2022 bamboomint amy woodhouse all rights reserved no part of this pattern may be published reproduced or sold in any form or by any means shared translated or altered without prior permission in writing from the author you may not sell items made from this pattern property of bamboomint amy woodhouse legs start with yarn b and work in a continuous spiral of rounds make two 01 5sc in magic_ring 5 02-05 5sc 5 06-07 2slst 3hdc 5 08-10 5sc 5 to finish slip_stitch into the next st and leave a long tail for sewing cut the thread sew the legs to the underside of the body between rounds 6 and 9 counting bottom up they should be placed roughly in line with the eyes antenna start with yarn a and work in a continuous spiral of rounds into a starting chain when creating the starting chain leave a long thread to be able to sew to the body later on 01 5ch join with single_crochet 4sc 5 02-07 5sc 5 08 change to yarn b increase-flo x5 10 09-10 10sc 10 11 3sc decrease x2 8 12 single_crochet decrease single_crochet x2 6 break the yarn and close the round through the front loops of the remaining 6 sts sew to the top of the body covering the first round in the centre final touches add some blush cheeks to your forest spirit just under the eyes for an extra cute look thank you for taking a
